author: Kate King
title: New Jersey Looks to Strengthen Pay-Equity Laws
text:
New Jersey lawmakers are set to vote Monday on far-reaching legislation that would make the stateâ€™s pay-equity laws among the strongest in the nation.
The bill, which is expected to pass the Democratic-controlled legislature with bipartisan support, would make it easier for women and minorities to pursue pay-discrimination claims and significantly expand the amount of damages they could collect from employers who are found guilty.
